places.name: Taj Mahal
places.shortDescription: Iconic ivory-white mausoleum, symbol of love
places.longDescription: Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum located in Agra, India. It was built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife Mumtaz Mahal. The monument is widely recognized as the finest example of Mughal architecture and is considered one of the most beautiful buildings in the world
positiveReviews: Must see I suggest the best timid group to visit this place is Sunrise one must hire a Guide and photographer they will explain and give you best shots of this wonder of the world.

Everything you hope it will be .
Heavy and segregated (male/female) security to get in but once inside ok. Don't take any food though.
Very well organised. Spend as long as you can to really soak it all up

An absolute must if you are travelling in Northern India. Purely breathtaking ðŸ˜Š we had a great guide accompany us which is a must to gain a full appreciation of the history that surrounds this great wonder of the world!

How can it not be a 5 star!  Truly amazing to see/experience in person!  

We went very early and beat the crowds.

Important reminder: Do not bring a selfie stick or a tripod, neither are allowed.

Such a romantic story and romantic place to be, the building is massive and the inlay of semi precious gems must have taken years to complete, be aware that you are restricted in what you can take in, no water, small bag, cameras, mobile allowed...

places.name: Agonda Beach
places.shortDescription: Serene and clean beach with clear water and stunning sunset
places.longDescription: Agonda Beach is a secluded and peaceful beach in South Goa known for its pristine white sand and crystal clear water. It is a perfect spot for a relaxing vacation, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. The beach is surrounded by hills and coconut groves which adds to its beauty. The calm and quiet atmosphere of the beach attracts tourists who are looking for some peaceful time with nature.
positiveReviews: a dream palm beach, with nice bars and restaurans. and on both sides of the bay its more exclusive and you find serenity.
We prolonged our stay here, since the little huts are quite relaxed, the beach is nice, water is calm. Only the cows might go a bit nuts from time to time :)

Agonda beach is a really beautiful and has an awesome restraunt. Water is water in the sea really clean. The curve line of the beach is really nice. The hut style restraunt is really superb. The beach very tempting you will definitely feel like taking...

Tucked away in South Goa, Agonda beach is a must visit destination. Calm & relaxed and so unspoilt, its an ideal place to spend an afternoon. We visited this beach in monsoons and that too during high tide. And for sure it was fun. Surrounded...

places.name: Amber Fort
places.shortDescription: Majestic fort with intricate architecture and breathtaking views of Jaipur city
places.longDescription: Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a stunning 16th-century hilltop fortress located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The fort is a masterpiece of Rajput architecture, featuring intricate carvings, mirror work, and stunning mosaics. It offers breathtaking views of Jaipur city and the surrounding Aravalli Hills. Visitors can explore the fort's sprawling palace complex, including the Sheesh Mahal (Hall of Mirrors), Diwan-e-Khas (Private Audience Hall), and Sukh Niwas (Hall of Pleasure).
places.activities: Sightseeing, Photography, Elephant ride, Light and Sound Show
positiveReviews:
A word if caution - it's a long walk uphill to the fort, and when we visited in April, temperature was 39c. If you're okay with that, prepare for a wonderful experience.
You can spend an hour or two wandering around, looking at the amazing...
The big daddy of Forts - in terms of architecture, size and grandeur. Its also superbly maintained which makes it a must visit.

This Palace is a stunning construction, the primary tourist attraction in Jaipur.  The combination of red sandstone and marble makes this structure memorable and significant.  As a World Heritage Site, it attracts approximately two million visitors a year.  Highly suggest that you hire a guide...
Wonderful both in details e.g. the exquisite inlaid stone mosaics, and harmoniously designed  large pavilions and courtyards.

places.name: 19 Degree North
places.shortDescription: 19 Degree North is a mountain resort in the Himalayas with scenic views and adventure sports
places.longDescription: 19 Degree North is a serene resort located in Lonavala, Maharashtra. It offers luxurious accommodation, spa facilities, and a range of activities including trekking, horse riding, and cycling. The resort is surrounded by lush greenery and provides a perfect getaway from the city's hustle and bustle. Its scenic location and comfortable amenities make it a popular destination for both families and couples seeking a peaceful and relaxing vacation
positiveReviews: Aamby valley is a beautiful place with its clear blue skies and fresh green grass. My family and I visited aamby valley to celebrate my mother's birthday. My mom had the most splendid time. Thanks to Pinky Bharadwaj for handling our booking from Bombay. Together...

places.name: Agra Fort
places.shortDescription: Agra Fort is a UNESCO World Heritage site, a red sandstone fortress of Mughal era
places.longDescription: Agra Fort, located in Agra, India, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most popular tourist destinations in India. It is a red sandstone fort that served as the main residence of the Mughal emperors until 1638. The fort features several beautiful palaces, including the Jahangiri Mahal and the Khas Mahal, and the Diwan-i-Am and Diwan-i-Khas, which were used for public and private audiences. The fort also provides stunning views of the Taj Mahal, making it a must-visit destination for those touring Agra
places.activities: Photography, Architecture, Sound and light show
positiveReviews: Absolut impressive! You can imagine the history of the powerful family and how they lived and found their decisions. Seeing this creates ideas of the old stories.

Must see place in Agra.A historical place with some of common ruler having there contribution. Shahajahan who built Taj was house arrested in this fort .It is wonderful to see this which has wonderful carvings. View from here of Taj is amazing. Hire a guide...

places.name: Jagannath Temple
places.shortDescription: Jagannath Temple is a historic Hindu temple in Puri, dedicated to Lord Jagannath
places.longDescription: Jagannath Temple is a famous Hindu temple located in Puri, Odisha, India. It is dedicated to Lord Jagannath, an incarnation of Lord Vishnu. The temple is known for its intricate architecture and sculptures. The annual Rath Yatra festival attracts millions of pilgrims from all over India. The temple has a unique kitchen called "Ananda Bazaar" that feeds thousands of devotees every day. The temple is considered as one of the Char Dhams, the four sacred abodes of Hinduism.
positiveReviews: Big compound with a number of temples. Peaceful place to be if you happen to be a Hindu. The complex houses various gods with Lord Jagannath in centrepiece.
Nice temple with a quiet environment. If you are looking for something spiritual in Agartala, I specially recommend this place.You can have a meal there by buying coupons for lunch. Entry is free.
this place is really bring the old memories of Puri Jagannath temple & the idols are excellent , just as good as Puri Temple
If you are in the vicinity vising the Government Museum do visit the temple as well. One of the better kept of the many temples in the city
Small but beautiful temple at the heart of city. Neat and clean, well maintained. Popular within local people.
negativeReviews: Nothing much to see that is ancient and on top of that a rude priest obscenely hand gestured my husband and asked him to get out. There was no sign that foreigners are not allowed. Yes, Hinduism has been brought to this nasty, low lever...

places.name: Swaminarayan Akshardham
places.shortDescription: Hindu temple showcasing Indian culture, architecture and spirituality
places.longDescription: Swaminarayan Akshardham is a Hindu temple complex in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India. It showcases the essence of Hindu culture, art, and architecture. The temple is a blend of ancient Indian wisdom and modern technology. Visitors can admire the intricate carvings, beautiful sculptures, and stunning gardens.
places.activities: Worship, Musical Fountain Show, Light and Sound Show

places.name: Golden Temple
places.shortDescription: Sikhism's holiest shrine, golden-domed temple surrounded by a sacred pool
places.longDescription: The Golden Temple, also known as Sri Harmandir Sahib or Darbar Sahib, is the most revered pilgrimage site of the Sikh faith. The gilded structure is surrounded by the sacred Amrit Sarovar pool, which is said to have healing properties. The complex also houses the Akal Takht, the highest seat of Sikh authority. The daily langar (free meal) served to visitors is one of the largest community kitchens in the world.
positiveReviews:
So wonderful, so powerful and so beautiful.

Also Iâ€™ll recommend to spend the night in a good hotel - close to the temple.

The Harmandir Sahib, also known as Darbar Sahib (Punjabi pronunciation:  "Abode of God", "Exalted Holy Court", is a Gurdwara located in the city of Amritsar, Punjab, India.
The Gurdwara is spiritually the most significant shrine in the Sikh Religion.
This place is so beautiful. I went there last week . People across the globe use to come and visit Golden Temple.

What a wonderfully managed place. It turns your heart to Gold! Makes you feel so emotional and full of devotion. You develop a sense of pride for the entire Sikh community and also for the country. A must see by everyone.
